The photo was published on a Hong Kong: based Facebook page on October 18, 2020, with over 15,000 followers.
The caption of the post: written in traditional Chinese, translates to English as "Facing hak ging, even Buddha gets inflamed," with "hak ging" meaning "rogue police" and being used by pro-democracy protesters in Hong Kong.
A reverse image search on Google found t: based media website in April 2016, during a protest in front of the Borella Immigration Office.
